Class DBAdapter.QuestionTableAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • bootcamp.kcv2.util.DBAdapter.QuestionTableAdapter
  • Enclosing class:
    DBAdapter

    public static final class DBAdapter.QuestionTableAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps to manage Questions in Database.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean clearQuestionTable()
      This method clears(deletes) Question Table in MySQL database.

      This method inserts new question in database MySQL with new ID(objects ID is ignored).

      This method pulls question theme from MySQL database.

    • Method Detail

      • pullQuestionBundle

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Question> pullQuestionBundle(java.lang.String currentQuestionBundle)
        This method returns question object searched by SET in MySQL database.
        Parameters:
        currentQuestionBundle - - question bundle that currently is used
        Returns:
        null if no such question in Question table was found, otherwise returns ArrayList of object Question if question was found
        See Also:
        SQLException

      • pullBundleNames

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pullBundleNames()
        This method pulls question theme from MySQL database.
        Returns:
        bundle names for question
        See Also:
        SQLException

      • insertQuestion

        public static boolean insertQuestion(Question question)
        This method inserts new question in database MySQL with new ID(objects ID is ignored).
        Parameters:
        question - object with parameters
        Returns:
        true if question in database was added, false if wasn't
        See Also:
        SQLException

      • clearQuestionTable

        public static boolean clearQuestionTable()
        This method clears(deletes) Question Table in MySQL database.
        Returns:
        true if table was deleted, false if wasn't
        See Also:
        SQLException
